department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Maintenance, enhancement, and security of core intelligence and imagery systems supported by 765 Comm Sqn
description: Informatics professional services to maintain, enhance, and secure core intelligence and imagery systems supported by 765 Comm Sqn
duration_in_months: It is intended to result in the award of 1 contract, each for 3 year plus 2 one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s).
